title: Grades K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
subject: Career and Vocational Education Content Standards (2014-)

document.title: Wyoming Career and Vocational Education Content Standards

5B3B6362B8C248ADA9BECA817A250A32.description: Students understand and appropriately use available technology systems.

0B304C09A0DD432297C1D9CF51AF812B.description: Students understand and apply the responsibilities of digital citizenship.

F58BDE05EAFD47AC8E3E97AB4AF51E91.description: Students examine family, community, monetary, and school systems.

B019C0A575D54F16B13A2DA9343D5B46.description: Students explain the need for rules within organizational systems.

B9FB7E27D7714FF2B87BD7C5D46156B0.description: Technical Proficiency and Productivity: Students safely, ethically, and productively use existing and new technologies and systems.

5A3F0AD439BF4C858200414C00497D13.description: Students interpret information presented visually, orally, or quantitatively (e.g., in charts, graphs, diagrams, time lines, animations, or interactive elements on Web pages) and explain how the information contributes to an understanding of the text in which it appears.

7466FBAE64734F47BAA4FFE4EE4460ED.description: Students explain events, procedures, ideas, or concepts in technical texts, including what happened and why, based on specific information in the text.

3AAAD653DFB348A49A03F4FD6C5B8DE7.description: Students read and comprehend a variety of sources that provide workplace information, including functional texts.

546CCAFB76B5454FA76118DA1A053C63.description: Students use a variety of methods including oral, written, graphic, pictorial, and/or multimedia in order to create and share a product.

F9764650FB774455870D008680ECE8A4.description: Technical Literacy: Students effectively read, evaluate, write, and communicate technical information.

D0EBB214E685472EB7DBC70E2DAB9A64.description: Students seek help from appropriate people (staff, students, parents, etc.) and appropriate resources.

52BB62F684F64B30882D73FCE0347982.description: Students collect and analyze data to identify solutions and make informed decisions.

B94818654EDB4FCE8C61F4D61559E18E.description: Students plan and manage activities to develop a solution or complete a project.

84021079306A4E6BA6A3D155EB37D7DF.description: Students identify and define real-world problems and meaningful questions for investigation.

51CA5CE3450F4DD08B58B2976F04ADC1.description: Critical Thinking and Problem Solving: Students use critical thinking skills to plan and conduct research, manage projects, solve problems, and make informed decisions using appropriate technology, tools, and resources.

1C5B01C3820A4FDEB59EE27BBB504335.description: Students apply safe, legal, and responsible use of information and technology as appropriate to the task.

B357486BB5F2460986AD232FB9217DD8.description: Students identify and actively participate in group roles and responsibilities while demonstrating respect and awareness of diversity.

9805E92A12A64E07A37354BBED6AD254.description: Students share new concepts learned through peer teaching and presenting to a group.

C891E936194F41A68167B0275208155F.description: Students identify and practice compromise and conflict resolution skills.

D98BCEE147744CE4AC86E84666EB73C6.description: Communication and Collaboration: Students develop the skills necessary to effectively lead, collaborate, and communicate.

652107CF96A94D40A89D7A0813031530.description: Students complete tasks within an allotted time by acquiring, storing, organizing, and using materials and space efficiently.

728A1DA46E2145C080DEF7842F779BFB.description: Students identify and demonstrate behaviors contributing to the successful completion of workplace tasks.

72C8308F2A3D435B9506A9FE7EC79558.description: Students describe how work relates to meeting needs for goods, clothing, shelter, and other necessities for living.

2A1FA2166A124B5383C4FE4C913E2950.description: Students identify and describe various occupations.

C052DB82D42542E0BD355380B606BDA7.description: Career Development and Readiness: Students demonstrate career planning and employability skills.
